school: Biomedical Sciences School, Historical & Philosophical Inq, Mathematics & Physics School
description: Students majoring in biomedical sciences will gain an appreciation of 1) the contribution of their specialisation to contemporary biomedical science & the potential benefits to the community 2) the importance of scientific ethics & 3) the importance of statistical and/or computational skills in analysis & interpretation of data.
prerequisites: BIOL2200 + STAT1201 + (BIOM2012 or BIOM2020 or BIOL2202 or BIOL2902 or BIOM2402 or BIOM2208 or MICR2000)
restricted: Course is available only to BBiomedSc and BSc (Biomedical Science) students.
